message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $15,000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget, the value of this product is quite high. Could you consider $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
